name: $25 Sparrow Gift Card
description:
Description Size Chart
Gift cards are the simplest, speediest way to send something special! They can either be emailed to the lucky recipient or printed out at home (but we do not mail out physical cards). If you would like the gift certificate to be e-mailed directly to the recipient, simply provide their name, email address, your name and message within the Notes section of the PayPal checkout.

Note: To redeem, the total purchase must be equal or greater than the gift certificate amount before taxes and shipping.
Sparrow gift cards never expire.
